posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 找最小的小正方形
posts.text: 12345678910111213141516def find_max_square(length, width): print(length, width) if length == width: return width tmp = length - width if width>tmp: length = width width = tmp else: length = tmp width = width find_max_square(length, width) print(find_max_square(180, 160))print(find_max_square(20, 18))

posts.title: 我的第一篇文章
posts.text: 如何使用hexonode.js的支持(npm->cnpm)git一下(hexo)本地测试，部署至自己的github上主题切换(git,yilia)修改hexo的配置文件hexo基本操作(hexo n,hexo clean,hexo g,hexo d) 参考参考自B站codesheep
